features: 【SMALL POCKET SIZE】KIDEE Handheld fan weighs just 3 ounces. The mini fan has a compact size that can fit into almost any handbag and your pocket. You can pull it anythere out when you experience a hot flash.

【3-SPEED & POWERFUL WIND】KIDEE portable fan has built-in copper brushless motors, which are powerful enough to generate strong wind. You just need to press the power button to change the 3 wind setting of the hand fan.

【USB C POWERED & RECHARGEABLE】KIDEE personal fan is powered by an upgraded rechargeable 1200mAh battery which can last 2-6 hours, A full charge takes 3 hours. You can charge it from a regular outlet, computer, or any other device via a USB port.

【ULTRA QUIET】Ultra silent operation, the small eyelash fan rechargeable provides cool wind but never disturb you, which can be switched easily by pressing the button. Press the button, will help you cool down in seconds. The mini hand fan is a great helper to keep cool during hot flashes.

【GREAT SUMMER GIFT】Super cute fairy pocket fan battery operated, unique silicone hook design makes the hand held fan handy to carry. A cute must-have for hot summer days. The travel fan brings you a quick relief of wind onto your face.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How long can the battery last with a full charge ? KIDEE mini fan is equipped with 1200mAh battery and requires approximately 3 hours to fully charge. Providing 2-6 hours running time depending on the usage settings. Can the small fan’s wind speed be adjusted? Yes, KIDEE portable fan offers 3 adjustable wind speeds to meet your different needs. Does the small hand fan produce minimal noise during operation? Absolutely, KIDEE is designed to operate with minimal noise less than 30db, ensuring a quiet and comfortable cooling experience. What is the charging method for the lash fan? KIDEE personal fan utilizes a convenient USB charging method (5V/1A Type C), providing flexibility and ease of charging through various USB-compatible devices

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No batteries to fool with!! It's rechargable.
reviews.reviewText: I order products to give honest reviews on Amazon Vine. I am so happy to have this cute little fan! I work at a retirement home. Once a month, we have a manicure day where three of us do manicures for the ladies. Our biggest need has been a way to dry their nails after we paint them so they don't get nail polish smeared or on themselves. We usually use a piece of paper folded to fan them. Hence, the need to get this little fan! The Kidee fan has three speeds from low to high. You just push a button on the back of the fan to the speed you need. It will be easy for me to hold the fan and dry the ladies nails and so much easier than using a piece of paper. If the battery gets low, you just plug the charger in that comes with the fan and let it recharge. I am very satisfied with this product, and it's going to work with me tomorrow!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for ostomy care
reviews.reviewText: This works great for drying skin tac, or skin prep, or anything else involving ostomy care! It has made changing a system so much faster.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small but powerful
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this hoping to use it while traveling overseas, as well as during the hot summer months. So far I'm impressed with the KIDEE Portable Handheld Fan.It's very helpful that it doesn't use batteries, but charges via USB cable instead (included). It can fully charge in several hours, and the charge can last most of the day on the lowest speed. It has three speeds, and even the lowest speed quietly produces a strong and steady stream of cool air.It's slightly larger than my smartphone and fits easily in my purse or carry-on. The hook at the bottom is perfect for attaching to a lanyard or the latch for the airplane tray table. It's very lightweight, but still feels sturdy and durable. The price is comparable to similar products.I took a star off because it would be more convenient if the on/off/fan speed button was located somewhere more easily accessible, like on the handle or on the front of the fan, instead of the back. It would also be great if it came with a stand, but otherwise I recommend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This fan is perfect size for a purse and traveling. It is small but is surprisingly powerful. It comes already charged which is nice. You just press the button on the back once, twice, or three times depending on the fan speed you want. While it is powerful even on “low” it is kinda noisy. I like that there are no batteries to fuss with as it is recharagable. This will be a staple in my purse in the warmer months, Essp at work before my job before they turn on the air conditioning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A lot smaller than I expected, but it is powerful on the breeze it puts out so that nice. You’ll need something to protect the on button if you carry it in your purse (it’s small enough) as it is just a push button on the back and will easily get turned on and drained as things shift in a purse. Overall happy with it but haven’t tested the usage time yet as it’s winter and this is bought for on the boat in summers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This 3 speed fan is amazing. I love the power of if when put on high. It is rechargeable, and easily fits inside my bowling bag. I've been needing something to cool me off when I'm bowling, and now I have this. So happy with this find, and would recommend anyone else to get it. I used to have a piece that plugged into my iphone, but it wasn't really powerful. Now this small yet powerful fan will keep me cool while bowling, and while outside this summer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Purse-Sized Fan!
reviews.reviewText: I have a hand-held fan, but I wanted one for my purse. When I came across this, I was thrilled because it was sized perfectly to carry with me.The fan is pretty quiet. It gets a bit louder with each speed increase, but even on high, it's not distracting to others.Women of "certain age" definitely should consider this hand held fan! It's definitely going to be a huge relief for me when away from my house!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty!
reviews.reviewText: This handheld fan has become a lifesaver for my mom. She’s been hot-flashing like crazy because of menopause. I was going to get her a regular manual fan, but then I saw this. She absolutely loves it! It puts off so much air. It's small but mighty. It’s rechargeable, pocket-size, and has three speeds. Perfect for cooling down throughout the day.
